short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts natural language queries into Google advanced search queries

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply start your Google search with "q:" to use this extension.

Key Features:
- Search in Natural Language: Search exactly how you think, without worrying about phrasing
- Seamless Integration: Built on top of your existing search engine, just with better results
- Improved Relevance: Delivers more accurate and credible results that better captures the semantic meaning behind your queries
- Advanced Query Conversion: Leverages Google advanced search operators to filter out noise and deliver you exactly what you need

Best for specific queries that Google typically has a difficult time interpreting—when you know what information you need but don’t know the best way to search for it.
